trans-unit.source: Represents a document viewing control that can host paginated <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> content such as an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示文件檢視控制項，這個控制項可以裝載已編頁的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument" /> 內容，例如 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the DocumentViewer Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂 DocumentViewer 控制項

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>, see [DocumentViewer Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>，請參閱[DocumentViewer 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/documentviewer-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> can zoom out more.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 是否可以進一步縮小的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can zoom out more; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可以進一步縮小，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The minimum zoom value is 5%.
trans-unit.target: 最小縮放值是 5%。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property becomes `false` when the minimum zoom level is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>屬性變成`false`到達的最小縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanDecreaseZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanDecreaseZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> can zoom in more.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 是否可以進一步放大的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can zoom in more; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可以進一步放大，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The maximum zoom value is 5000%.
trans-unit.target: 最大縮放值為 5000%。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> becomes `false` when the maximum zoom level is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> 會變成`false`到達最大縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanIncreaseZoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanIncreaseZoom" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> can move down more in the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 是否可以在文件中進一步向下移動的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can move down more in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the document is at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可以在文件中進一步向下移動，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果已經到達文件最下方，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveDown" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveDown" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> can move more to the left in the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 是否可以在文件中進一步向左移動的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can move more left in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the document is at the leftmost edge.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可以在文件中進一步向左移動，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果已經到達文件最左邊，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveLeft" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveLeft" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> can move more to the right in the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 是否可以在文件中進一步向右移動的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can move more to the right in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the document is at the rightmost edge.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可以在文件中進一步向右移動，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果已經到達文件最右邊，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveRight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveRight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> can move up more in the document.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 是否可以在文件中進一步向上移動的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control can move up more in the document; otherwise, <see langword="false" /> if the document is at the topmost edge.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項可以在文件中進一步向上移動，則為 <see langword="true" />，如果已經到達文件最上方，則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveUp" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanMoveUp" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Zooms out of the document content by one zoom step.
trans-unit.target: 以一個縮放步驟來縮小文件內容。

trans-unit.source: The following are the zoom level increments.
trans-unit.target: 以下是縮放層級的增量。

trans-unit.source: The minimum zoom level is 5%.
trans-unit.target: 最小縮放層級是 5%。

trans-unit.source: After the minimum zoom level is reached, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A> has no more effect.
trans-unit.target: 達到最小縮放層級之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.DecreaseZoom%2A>沒有更多的作用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false` when the minimum zoom level is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanDecreaseZoom%2A>屬性會傳回`false`到達的最小縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets the overall vertical height of the paginated document.
trans-unit.target: 取得已分頁文件的整體垂直高度。

trans-unit.source: The overall vertical height of the paginated content specified in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 以與裝置無關的像素指定之已分頁內容的整體垂直高度。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: For vertical page arrangements, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> is the sum of all the page heights and includes the space between pages.
trans-unit.target: 頁面上垂直排列的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>是所有頁面高度的總和，並包含頁面間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentHeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentHeight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the overall horizontal width of the paginated document.
trans-unit.target: 取得已分頁文件的整體水平寬度。

trans-unit.source: The current horizontal width of the content layout area specified in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 內容配置區域的目前水平寬度 (以與裝置無關的像素為指定單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: For horizontal page arrangements, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> is the sum of all the page widths and includes the space between pages.
trans-unit.target: 水平頁面上排列，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>所有頁面寬度的總和，而且包含頁面間的空間。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentWidth" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Moves focus to the find toolbar to search the document content.
trans-unit.target: 將焦點移至搜尋工具列，以搜尋文件內容。

trans-unit.source: Fits a single page to the height of the current viewport.
trans-unit.target: 讓單一頁面符合目前檢視區 (Viewport) 的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> that performs the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> 作業的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight" />。

trans-unit.source: The routed command that performs the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight" /> 作業的已傳送命令。

trans-unit.source: Fits the document to the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 讓文件符合 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> 屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: Fits the document to the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 讓文件符合目前的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> 屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of pages to fit in the current <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: 要符合目前 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ExtentWidth" /> 的頁面數目上限。

trans-unit.source: Fits the document to a specified maximum number of page widths.
trans-unit.target: 讓文件符合指定的頁面寬度數字上限。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> that performs the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> 作業的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" />。

trans-unit.source: The routed command that performs the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> 作業的已傳送命令。

trans-unit.source: Fits a single page to the width of the current viewport.
trans-unit.target: 讓單一頁面符合目前檢視區 (Viewport) 的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> that performs the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> 作業的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth" />。

trans-unit.source: The routed command that performs the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth" /> 作業的已傳送命令。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth%2A> sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> control to display a single page width with pages zoomed to the width of the current viewport.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth%2A> 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制項來顯示單一頁面寬度與頁面縮放比例，以在目前的檢視區的寬度。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains <see langword="true" /> if the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> elements changed after the last call to <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在上一次呼叫 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 之後 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.GetPageViewsCollection(System.Boolean@)" /> 項目集合變更了，這個方法會傳回、包含 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> elements that are currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前所顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 項目集合。

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> elements that are currently displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 目前顯示在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentPageView" /> 控制項中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> 項目集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal scroll position.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定水平捲軸位置。

trans-unit.source: The current horizontal scroll position specified in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 目前的水平捲軸位置 (以與裝置無關的像素為指定單位)。

trans-unit.source: The initial default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 初始預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> property causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> control to scroll to the specified horizontal offset.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>屬性原因<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制項捲動至指定水平位移。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal offset is measured from the left edge of the visible content area.
trans-unit.target: 起可見的內容區域的左邊緣的水平位移。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您不能使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`)，可供許多其他 「 寬度 」 或 「 水平 」 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to **true**
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為**，則為 true**

trans-unit.source: The value specified to set is negative.
trans-unit.target: 所指定要設定的值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalOffset" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalOffset" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal space between pages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定頁面間的水平空間。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal space between displayed pages specified in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 與裝置無關像素中指定頁面之間的水平空間。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10.0。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalPageSpacing%2A> property adjusts the horizontal spacing between pages.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalPageSpacing%2A>屬性調整頁面的水平間距。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Width" or "Horizontal" properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您不能使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`)，可供許多其他 「 寬度 」 或 「 水平 」 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: The value specified to set is negative.
trans-unit.target: 所指定要設定的值為負數。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalPageSpacing" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.HorizontalPageSpacing" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Zooms in on the document content by one zoom step.
trans-unit.target: 以一個縮放步驟來放大文件內容。

trans-unit.source: The following are the zoom level increments.
trans-unit.target: 以下是縮放層級的增量。

trans-unit.source: The maximum zoom value is 5000%.
trans-unit.target: 最大縮放值為 5000%。

trans-unit.source: After the maximum zoom level is reached, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A> has no more effect.
trans-unit.target: 達到最大縮放層級之後，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.IncreaseZoom%2A>沒有更多的作用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A> property returns `false` when the maximum zoom level is reached.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.CanIncreaseZoom%2A>屬性會傳回`false`到達最大縮放層級。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value defining the maximum number of page columns to display.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，定義要顯示之頁面資料行的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of page columns to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 要顯示之頁面資料行的最大數目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross%2A> can be set to a positive integer value from 1 to 32, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross%2A> 可以設定為正整數值從 1 到 32 之間。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the document content down 16 device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 將文件內容向下捲動 16 個與裝置無關的像素。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the document content left 16 device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 將文件內容向右捲動 16 個與裝置無關的像素。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the document content right 16 device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 將文件內容向右捲動 16 個與裝置無關的像素。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the document content up 16 device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 將文件內容向上捲動 16 個與裝置無關的像素。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The object to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 要設定為可見的物件。

trans-unit.source: The rectangular region of the <c>element</c> to make visible.
trans-unit.target: 要使其可見的 <c>element</c> 矩形區域。

trans-unit.source: The number of the page to be viewed.
trans-unit.target: 要檢視的頁面頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnBringIntoView(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.Rect,System.Int32)" /> method from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 回應來自 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.OnBringIntoView(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.Rect,System.Int32)" /> 實作的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The base implementation will move the master page to the page on which the element occurs.
trans-unit.target: 基底實作會移到項目會發生頁面的主版頁面。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立並傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DocumentViewerAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.DecreaseZoom" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.DecreaseZoom" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls when the document to display is changed.
trans-unit.target: 當要顯示的文件變更時回應呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.OnDocumentChanged%2A> responds to calls when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> control is set to display a new document.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.OnDocumentChanged%2A> 回應呼叫時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.Document%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制項設定為要顯示新的文件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Find" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Find" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.FirstPage" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.FirstPage" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToMaxPagesAcross" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="Overload:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToMaxPagesAcross" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToMaxPagesAcross" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToMaxPagesAcross" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The number of pages to fit across the content area.
trans-unit.target: 要符合跨內容區域的頁面數目。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToMaxPagesAcross(System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToMaxPagesAcross(System.Int32)" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToWidth" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The page number to position to.
trans-unit.target: 要定位至該頁的頁碼。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GoToPage(System.Int32)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.GoToPage(System.Int32)" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: `pageNumber` is a positive (non-negative, non-zero) page number that starts at one (1).
trans-unit.target: `pageNumber` 是一 (1) 開始的正數 （非負數的非零） 的頁面數字。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.IncreaseZoom" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.IncreaseZoom" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 回應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.LastPage" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.LastPage" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 回應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveDown" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveDown" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveLeft" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveLeft" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveRight" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveRight" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveUp" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MoveUp" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.NextPage" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.NextPage" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseWheel" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 回應 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseWheel" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PreviousPage" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase.PreviousPage" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageDown" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageDown" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageLeft" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageLeft" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageRight" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageRight" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageUp" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ScrollPageUp" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Responds to calls to the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnails" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 回應對 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnails" /> 方法的呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls down one viewport.
trans-unit.target: 向下捲動一個檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls left one viewport.
trans-unit.target: 向左捲動一個檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls right one viewport.
trans-unit.target: 向右捲動一個檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls up one viewport.
trans-unit.target: 向上捲動一個檢視區。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether drop-shadow page borders are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要顯示下拉式陰影頁面框線。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if drop-shadow borders are displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果顯示下拉式陰影框線，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ShowPageBorders" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ShowPageBorders" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical scroll position.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定垂直捲軸的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current vertical scroll position offset in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 目前的垂直捲軸位置位移 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> must be set with non-negative offset values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> 必須是非負數位移的值設定。

trans-unit.source: Setting a negative value raises an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 設定為負值引發<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The vertical offset is measured from the top of the visible content area.
trans-unit.target: 可見的內容區域的頂端起的垂直位移。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您不能使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`)，可供許多其他 「 高度 」 或 「 垂直 」 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalOffset" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalOffset" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical spacing between displayed pages.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定顯示頁面之間的垂直間距。

trans-unit.source: The vertical space between displayed pages in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 所顯示頁面之間的垂直間距，以與裝置無關的像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10.0。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalPageSpacing%2A> property adjusts the vertical spacing between pages to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalPageSpacing%2A>屬性調整為指定的值的頁面之間的垂直間距。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalPageSpacing%2A> value must be non-negative.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalPageSpacing%2A>值必須是非負數。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property to a negative value will raise an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為負數值將會引發<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: When setting this property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], you cannot use the unit qualifiers (such as `in` or `cm`) that are enabled for many other "Height" or "Vertical" properties.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性時[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，您不能使用的單位限定詞 (例如`in`或`cm`)，可供許多其他 「 高度 」 或 「 垂直 」 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalPageSpacing" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.VerticalPageSpacing" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical size of the scrollable content area.
trans-unit.target: 取得可捲動內容區域的垂直大小。

trans-unit.source: The vertical size of the scrollable content area in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 可捲動內容區域的垂直大小 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewportHeight" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewportHeight" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal size of the scrollable content area.
trans-unit.target: 取得可捲動內容區域的水平大小。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal size of the scrollable content area in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 可捲動內容區域的水平大小 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0.0。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewportWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewportWidth" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Displays a thumbnail representation of the pages.
trans-unit.target: 顯示頁面的縮圖表示。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> that performs the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnails" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得執行 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.RoutedUICommand" /> 作業的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnails" />。

trans-unit.source: The routed command that performs the <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnails" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 執行 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnails" /> 作業的已傳送命令。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnailsCommand%2A> sizes and arranges the view to display a thumbnail preview of each page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.ViewThumbnailsCommand%2A> 大小和排列檢視來顯示每個頁面的縮圖預覽。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the keyboard shortcut key associated with this command.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示與此命令相關聯的鍵盤快速鍵。

trans-unit.source: Shortcut Key
trans-unit.target: 快速鍵

trans-unit.source: [none]
Gets or sets the document zoom percentage.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文件的縮放百分比。

trans-unit.source: The zoom percentage expressed as a value, 5.0 to 5000.0.
trans-unit.target: 縮放百分比表示為 5.0 到 5000.0 的值。

trans-unit.source: The default is 100.0, which corresponds to 100.0%.
Setting this property causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> control to zoom to the specified value.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性可讓<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制項以縮放至指定的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A> property must be a value between 5.0 to 5000.0 (inclusive), which corresponds to a percentage range 5.0% to 5000.0%.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A>屬性必須是對應至一個百分比範圍 5.0%到 5000.0 %5.0 到 5000.0 （含） 之間的值。

trans-unit.source: Actions or commands that require a layout update may change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A> property setting.
trans-unit.target: 動作或需要配置更新的命令，可能會變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A>屬性設定。

trans-unit.source: For example, changing the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross%2A>, calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight%2A> method, or invoking the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeightCommand%2A> can cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A> setting to change.
trans-unit.target: 例如，變更值的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.MaxPagesAcross%2A>，則呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeight%2A>方法，或叫用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.FitToHeightCommand%2A>可能會導致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom%2A>設定，以變更。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer.Zoom" /> 相依性屬性。
